item.title: SAMM BSIMM Mapping
item.description: Building Security In Maturity Model (BSIMM) Mapped to OWASP SAMM The full mapping sheet between BSIMM 14 and OWASP SAMM. Introduction The Building Security In Maturity Model (BSIMM) and OWASP Software Assurance Maturity Model (SAMM) share a unique history. Both were conceived around 2008-2009, during the early days of structured application security maturity frameworks. Over time, however, these two models have evolved independently, with distinct conceptual differences. We have previously explored these differences in detail (reference).
